rules_text:
The Oltenen Emissary is all colors.
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for spells that you cast. When you do, you may cast spells without paying their mana costs until end of turn.
flavor_text: [i]“Your death, Mr President, is nothing out of the ordinary. Just politicians fighting for power, same as it ever was.”[/i]
notes:
Once In A Lifetime — Talking Heads
